description: Try our easy to follow Mocha-Rum Self-Saucing Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mocha-Rum Self-Saucing Puddings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup espresso coffee, freshly made, cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease 6 x 150ml ramekins and place onto a baking tray.

Sift flour and cocoa into a large bowl. Stir in sugar and chocolate bits. Whisk milk, egg, butter, coffee and vanilla together in a bowl. Pour wet ingredients into flour mixture and stir to combine. Divide mixture between ramekins.
Combine extra sugar and cocoa in a bowl. Sprinkle evenly over puddings. Combine 1 1/4 cup boiling water and rum. Pour evenly over puddings. Bake puddings for 20 minutes or until set.
Transfer to saucers and dust with cocoa. Serve with a scoop of ice-cream.
